Person.Name: Shawn Hoerner
Person.Title: Principle Software Engineer
Description: I have extensive experience as a cloud software engineer, with over a decade of technical expertise in cloud-based solutions and leadership. My current skillset focuses on front-end/back-end technologies like React and ASP.NET Core, testing tools like Jest and RTL, and infrastructure tools like AWS and Terraform. My career has been marked by mentoring team members into leadership roles, spearheading product development initiatives, modernizing legacy systems, and enhancing developer workflows to foster innovation. I am now seeking advanced engineering leadership opportunities focused on driving impactful technological advancements

Education.Degree: Bachelor of Science, Applied Networking and Systems Administration
Education.Name: Rochester Institute of Technology

Jobs.Title: Lead Software Engineer
Description: Led the development of the Family Law Solution for our legal segment, collaborating with teams across the company and incorporating industry feedback to ensure accurate and effective requirements
Spearheaded the development of a feed service, leveraging micro-frontend technology to enhance ShareFile's development agility and enable rapid iteration on new ideas and product lines
Utilized AWS and Terraform extensively to seamlessly integrate and scale the feed service, resulting in improved performance and enhanced user experience
Assumed product ownership roles, guiding the web application server towards modernization and laying the foundation for migrating from legacy technology to containerized ASP.NET 6
Mentored team members, empowering them to take on team lead roles within the organization, fostering their professional growth and contributing to the overall success of the team

Jobs.Title: Senior Software Engineer
Description: Led a team of six developers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support to foster their growth and development
Acted as a central source of knowledge for developers, product teams, QA, and leadership, ensuring effective communication and collaboration
Facilitated a smoother on-boarding process for new developers by improving the documentation and providing comprehensive training
Played a key role in leveling-up several developers, ranging from interns to principal level, in front-end (React/Angular) and back-end (ASP.NET Core) technologies

Jobs.Title: Senior Software Test Engineer
